tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Veerendra is one of the most experienced doctor I would personally recommend. I had a disc slip in my cervix way back in 2014. I wasn't aware of his existence. So when I went to Mythri Hospital in Chandanagar, I was referred to him. He made an excellent diagnosis and started with step by step medication. Though I had an acute pain however he didn't jump into conclusion that it was a disc slip. Through step by step medication he diagnosed the right problem and made me cure in 2 months. My condition was serious when I first met him. However he didn't hurry up. Instead he did a thorough diagnosis to identify the root cause of the problem and got me recover. My friends who had similar cases ended up in surgery which I didn't. Today also I refer my family and friends to him for any orthopedic issues. My sincere gratitude and heartfelt thanks to him for being always available to take care of us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited for my husband's treatment. He had a sport's injury while playing badminton. I really liked the doctor's style of prescription...it's a very detailed format for a layman person like us. We visit the same doctor at Apollo every time we face a musculoskeletal issue. His explanation beyond the cause of the spine issue was very informative. His patience is well attributed. I wish he doesn't leave apollo üòä cos apollo Kondapur is quite accessible for me anytime. Please anyone having any issue related to spine and other musculoskeletal reasons can visit him within his mentioned hours. Thank you Sir.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words

review: I have no words to express about veerendra sir. Such an amazing humble person, with lot of patience. He listens our pain with patience and gives the correct solution. One would definitely forget about thier illness nd get cured from his words. he boosts the patient with confidence nd courage. He is highly skilled in his profession *** *** *** ** ********** He serves the best more than 100% to his job.gives correct and accurate treatment.no doubt one can trust nd don't need second opinion on any of the treatment he suggests and gives.perfect doctor orthopedic. I got treated for my shoulder cuff muscle inflammation. Well treated ,so happy nd confident nowüëç.we appreciate you sir.. great to have you. Thanks to appollo for having dr. Veerendra sir.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very friendly and patient. Explained the issue well. Kwire fixation was done to perfection. My nephew has completely recovered and is doing well.

I would defiantly recommend  Dr. Veerendra Mudnoor to people who are facing any issues related to spinal.
Doctor explained the issue in layman language. Explained in detail and didn't give any unnecessary test or medicines.
He was sounding really experienced and professional. Gave me step wise solution to my problem.

Apollo staff said that Practo is not updated and the consultation fee has been increased to 700. 
Laso the doctor was not there even though we reached before our appointment time the staff told us that our appointment will be delayed by 40 mins because the doctore is on the way (at 12:15 PM, my appointment was supposed to start at 12:20 PM) and there are already 2-3 patients before us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

review: Arrogant, impatient and never listened to patients. He was literally shouting on patients.  * ****** *** ****** ** *** ******* ***** ** **** ** ***** **** ******* Please avoid.
